description.text: this message file contains message for floorplan view

msg.text: Floorplan View - No REGION or UGROUP selected to show in Spreadsheet View.
Floorplan View: No REGION selected to PROHIBIT.
Floorplan View: No REGION selected to edit.
Floorplan View: No UGROUP selected to edit.
Floorplan View: UGROUP is NGD-based, cannot delete from Preference file.
Floorplan View: No CLOCK REGION selected to edit
Floorplan View: No CLOCK REGION selected to remove.
